extension.name: Membership Pro - Documents
extension.author: Tuan Pham Ngoc
extension.license: GNU General Public License version 3, or later
extension.description: This plugin allows you to manage and give your subscribers download restricted documents for each subscription plan

field.name: documents_path
field.label: Document Paths
field.description: Path to the folder which documents are stored. Could be an absolute path or relative path from root folder of your site

field.name: send_documents_via_email
field.label: Send Documents Via Email
field.description: If set to Yes, documents which is added to this plan will be sent to subscribers. You should only set this option to Yes if the size of documents are small and you only have few documents for each plan to make sure these documents can be delivered via email

field.name: show_on_frontend
field.label: Show On Frontend
field.description: If set to Yes, this plugin will be available on frontend add/edit plan form
